featured.text: Many thousand-year-old coins often sell for no more than a few dollars because there are a lot of them around, 23 a 1913 Liberty Head Nickel may sell for over one million US dollars because there are only five in existence.

definition.zh_def: 鎳，一種化學元素，符號為Ni，原子序數28，常用於製造合金和電池。
definition.en_def: Nickel is a chemical element with the symbol Ni and atomic number 28, commonly used in alloys and batteries.
definition.example: The coins are made of a nickel and copper alloy.
